about_the_game:
In Baking Bad you and your friends are criminals diagnosed with an extreme medical condition. In order to ward its effects, constant doctors visits need to be made but the medical bills aren't cheap.

Cook

Cook baked goods in the back of your RV with a large amount of recipes. Discover new recipes and master the product quality to maximize profits.

Sell

Distribute or sell your baked good either locally or through a dealer, just be careful of a deal going wrong.

Evade

Stay one step ahead of the relentless police force. They are determined to shut you down and will stop at nothing to catch you. Engage in intense combat or use your wits to outsmart and outrun them.
